cause.description:
Cystic fibrosis (CF) is an inherited chronic disease that affects the lungs and digestive systems of about 30,000 children and adults in the United States (70,000 worldwide). In the 1950s, few children with cystic fibrosis lived to attend elementary school. Today, advances in research and medical treatments have further enhanced and extended life for children and adults with CF,but there is still no cure! Join the group and help to find a cure!
1. We must donate money and help find a cure for Cystic Fibrosis
cause.mission: help find a cure for Cystic Fibrosis
cause.name: Laps for CF
